text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Woooh!! We did it!!! We're so amazing!!!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Yeah yeah. Anyways, are you gonna do that crap after every song? Come on, let's move on to the next one.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'm glad to see that the two of you are so motivated. Let us continue putting in effort until the anniversary live concert is held.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yup!! Let's do our best, TAISHIN!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wow, BNW looks so motivated! However, our group, Robot, Rose, and Iinchou (Class Representative), won't lose to them!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon-san, is this really okay? Is it really okay… to call you a robot…!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Status: acceptance. Rice-san, I have determined that my epithet matches with your epithet of "rose" in that it succinctly describes our personalities in one word.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Okay you two, let's go!! RRI, GO!!
